title: Puck League and Riot BS SYSTEM
body:
Puck League & their perma bans, UNBELIEVABLE. UNNECESSARY. They just wanna steal from us. Toyz
League is wack

replies.body:
Boy, are you gonna love
##*basically every online game in existence*

Get banned and rant on forums, that's 'fresh' bro.
Everyone is laughing at you, not with you. Especially because we all know you're making a level 1 account as we speak.
Wack game, meta dead, steals from players, DOTA 4EVER
Grow a pair and move on like a man.
